Object.Field:
create table SNP_ACTION (
I_TXT_DESC NUMBER(10) NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
I_ACTION NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
ACTION_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
ACTION_TYPE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_GRP_ACTION NUMBER(10) NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL
)

create table SNP_AGENT (
I_AGENT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
AGENT_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
HOST_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
HOST_PORT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
MAX_THREAD NUMBER(10) NULL ,
AGENT_NAME2 VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
I_ESS NUMBER(10) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL ,
APPLICATION_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
PROTOCOL VARCHAR2(10 CHAR) NULL ,
SCHED_CLEANUP_HH VARCHAR2(2 CHAR) NULL ,
SCHED_CLEANUP_MM VARCHAR2(2 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_AGENT_PROP (
I_AGENT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
PROP_KEY VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
PROP_VALUE VARCHAR2(150 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_AGENT_PROP_LST (
PROP_KEY VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
PROP_TYPE VARCHAR2(150 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
PROP_DEFAULT_VALUE VARCHAR2(150 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_ALLOC_AGENT (
I_CONTEXT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_LAGENT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_AGENT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_CONNECT (
I_CONNECT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_TECHNO NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_HOST NUMBER(10) NULL ,
CON_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
DSERV_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
CONNECT_TYPE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
IND_JNDI VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
JAVA_DRIVER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
JAVA_URL VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
JNDI_AUTHENT VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
JNDI_PROTO VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
JNDI_FACTORY VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
JNDI_URL VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
JNDI_RESSOURCE VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
JNDI_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
JNDI_PWD VARCHAR2(150 CHAR) NULL ,
USER_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
PASS VARCHAR2(150 CHAR) NULL ,
FETCH_ARRAY_SERV NUMBER(10) NULL ,
BATCH_UPDATE_SIZE NUMBER(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
I_TXT_JNDI_URL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
WS_DEPLOY_MODE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
I_TXT_WS_BASE_URL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_TXT_JAVA_URL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL ,
ON_CON_CMD CLOB NULL ,
ON_CON_IND_ERR VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
ON_CON_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
ON_CON_LOG_LEVEL VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
ON_CON_APPLY_COND VARCHAR2(50 CHAR) NULL ,
ON_DCN_CMD CLOB NULL ,
ON_DCN_IND_ERR VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
ON_DCN_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
ON_DCN_LOG_LEVEL VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
ON_DCN_APPLY_COND VARCHAR2(50 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_CONNECT_PROP (
PROP_KEY VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
I_CONNECT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
PROP_VALUE VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_CONTEXT (
I_CONTEXT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
CONTEXT_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
CONTEXT_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
CONF_PASSW VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_CONT VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_CONV_DT (
SRC_DT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_TARG_TECHNO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
TARG_DT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL
)

create table SNP_DATA (
I_DATA NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
DATA_CONTENTS LONG RAW NULL
)

create table SNP_DATASOURCE (
I_AGENT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_CONNECT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
JNDI_ENC VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
JNDI_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
PASSWORD VARCHAR2(150 CHAR) NULL ,
USERNAME VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_DT (
I_DT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_TECHNO NUMBER(10) NULL ,
DT_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
DT_SOURCE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
DT_DRIVER VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
CODE_DT VARCHAR2(3 CHAR) NULL ,
ICON_LETTER VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
DT_CRE_TAB VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_WRITE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL ,
WRITABLE_DT VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
DT_JAVA NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_ENTITY (
I_ENTITY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
NAME VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
CLASS_NAME VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,
NB_COL_DETAIL NUMBER(3) NULL ,
HEADING VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,

LARGE_IMAGE VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,

SMALL_ICON_RES VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
LARGE_ICON_RES VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
SDK_CLASS_NAME VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,
I_SNP_OBJECT_SECU NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_ENT_ID (
ID_SEQ NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
ID_TBL VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
ID_NEXT NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_ESS (
I_ESS NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
ESS_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,

SECU_PRINCIPAL VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
SECU_CREDENTIALS VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,

MDS_JNDI_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
RTS_JNDI_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL ,

SECU_RUNTIME_PRINCIPAL VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
SECU_RUNTIME_CREDENTIALS VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
ASYNC_JNDI_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_FF_VALUEM (
FF_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
I_INSTANCE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_OBJECTS NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
NUM_VALUE NUMBER(10) NULL ,
SHORT_TXT_VALUE VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_FIELD (
I_FIELD NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_ENTITY NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_LINK NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NAME VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
LONG_HEADING VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,
SHORT_HEADING VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,

DATA_TYPE VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NULL ,
STYLESHEET_CLASS VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NULL ,
MAX_SIZE NUMBER(10) NULL ,
POS_ORDER_BY NUMBER(10) NULL ,
POS_ENTITY_NAME NUMBER(10) NULL ,
POS_LIST NUMBER(10) NULL ,
POS_DETAIL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
POS_SEARCH NUMBER(10) NULL ,
SEARCH_TYPE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
POS_SEARCH_FORM NUMBER(10) NULL ,
IND_NAME_FIELD VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_I15D VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
EDITOR_CLASS VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
POS_EDIT_LIST NUMBER(10) NULL ,
EDITABLE_INSERT VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
EDITABLE_UPDATE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
I_LOOKUP NUMBER(10) NULL ,
MANDATORY VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,

)

create table SNP_FIELD_LOOKUP (
I_FIELD NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
DISPLAY_VALUE VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
TEXT_VALUE VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_FLEX_FIELD (
I_FF NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,

FF_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,

LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL
)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

I_LOOKUP NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
LOOKUP_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL
)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

)

I_TECHNO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,

JOIN_OUTER_LOC VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
JOIN_BRACE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
MAX_COL_NAME_LEN NUMBER(10) NULL ,
MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN NUMBER(10) NULL ,
DATE_FCT VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
REM_OBJ_PATTERN VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
LOC_OBJ_PATTERN VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
DDL_NULL VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DDL_VARCHAR_MASK VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DDL_NUMERIC_MASK VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DDL_DATE_MASK VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_LOGICAL VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_PHYSICAL VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
GET_DATE_REQUEST VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DDL_LONGRAW_MASK VARCHAR2(50 CHAR) NULL ,
I_AK_TXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_INDEX_TXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_CHECK_TXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_PK_TXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_FK_TXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
EXEC_PLAN_REQUEST VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL ,
IND_SEQUENCE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
I_SEQ_TXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
GET_SEQ_REQUEST VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
LOC_SEQ_PATTERN VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
REM_SEQ_PATTERN VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
SUB_PART_PATTERN VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_PARTITION VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
PART_PATTERN VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_SUPP_SET_OPERATOR VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_SUPP_DRVD_TBL VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_SUPP_SEL_LK VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
SET_OPERATOR_LST VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
JOIN_NATURAL VARCHAR2(50 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_INT_PRF_TAB VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_COL_PRF_TAB VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_ERR_PRF_TAB VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_JRN_PRF_TAB VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_JRN_PRF_VIE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_JRN_PRF_TRG VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_IDX_PRF_TAB VARCHAR2(25 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_USER (
I_WUSER NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
WUSER_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
WUSER_INIT VARCHAR2(3 CHAR) NULL ,
PASS VARCHAR2(150 CHAR) NULL ,
AUT_SUPERVISOR VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
EXPIRACY_DATE DATE NULL ,
I_TXT_DETAIL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
USER_EXPIRACY_DATE DATE NULL ,
GUID_EXTERNAL VARCHAR2(50 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_USER_METH (
I_WUSER NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_METH NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
GENERIC_PRIV VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_USER_OBJ_METH (
I_WUSER NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_METH NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_CONTEXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_OBJECTS NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_INSTANCE NUMBER(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_USER_PREF (
I_WUSER NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_PREF NUMBER(10) NOT NULL
)

create table SNP_USER_PROF (
I_WUSER NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_PROF NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_U_O_M_REP (
I_METH NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_CONTEXT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
I_WUSER NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
REP_ID NUMBER(3) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
I_INSTANCE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
I_OBJECTS NUMBER(10) NOT NULL
)

create table SNP_VERSION (
I_OBJECTS NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_INSTANCE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
VERSION_COMMENT VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
I_DATA NUMBER(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
INSTANCE_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
I_TXT_COMMENT NUMBER(10) NULL
)
